app.view

Class RootLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.view.RootLayoutController

  • public class RootLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is set as a controller class of the RootLayout.fxml. It handles all events of the GUI and also contains the logic to display a formula in the GUI and scale the formula component.
    Author:
    Daniel Sonnleitner, Pilar Wagner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RootLayoutController()
      The constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getLatexNewLine()
      Returns a new line for the latex String
      void handleZoomIn()
      Handle the zoom in; Method is called on a ButtonClick-Event defined in the Rootlayout.fxml
      void handleZoomOut()
      Handle the zoom out; Method is called on a ButtonClick-Event defined in the Rootlayout.fxml
      void showLatexFormula()
      Show a sample Latex Formula in a SwingNode

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
